text: Aman Thakur
Remember that time we laughed so hard we couldn't breathe?
Your smile could light up the entire city. Never forget that.
Thinking about our late-night talks. They mean the world.
You have a heart of gold. Don't ever let anyone dull your sparkle.
That silly dance you do when you're happy is my favorite thing.
Just a reminder that you are strong, capable, and amazing.
Remember that adventure we went on? Let's do it again soon.
Your kindness is a superpower.
I'm so grateful to have you in my life.
Can't wait to see what amazing things you do this year.
Your passion for your hobbies is truly inspiring.
Thinking about you and smiling today.
You make ordinary moments extraordinary.
Thank you for being you.
Never stop dreaming. You're destined for greatness.
Getting closer! The excitement is building up!
You deserve all the happiness in the world.
Three more days! Can you feel the magic in the air?
So close! Hope you're ready for an amazing birthday.
The day before the big day! Sending you all my love.
